mean_cn: v. 以计谋胜过，运用策略击败
mean_en: to use cleverness or skill to gain an advantage over (someone)
word_etyma: out胜过+maneuver策略→以计谋胜过；运用策略击败
short_phrase: The Greeks outmaneuvered the Trojans with this horse.
sentence: The Greeks outmaneuvered the Trojans by hiding their soldiers in a big wooden horse.
sentence_trans: 希腊人用把士兵藏在大木马里的策略击败了特洛伊人。
